name: (48 Hour Jam) Jamie's Little Pony
description:
Description: Jamie's mom is cleaning his bedroom. Jamie's little ponie gets in the way of cleaning, so she put it near the window. Suddenly, a strong wind blows and the toy falls out of the window. The toy takes a journey to find its home back. 

Genre: Puzzle / Discovery 

Goal: Return to Jamie's bed. (5 y.o.)

How to play: Press W/A/S/D to move, or press E to interact. If you're stuck in a weird place you can press R to reset the position. Enjoy!
